posts.description: Are there any guidelines for what should be on this poster?

comments.mc: They said it will be discussed in class tomorrow.  Apparently we will design it on the computer and submit it to be printed.
will the slides also be posted with this information?

posts.description: In the lecture slides, I have found multiple different definitions of 'prototype'  and a lof of details for each. Are we expected to know all of these different definitions and examples?
Do we need to submit this before our demo or any time before its stated deadline? (may 4th)

comments.mc: That is just a dummy submission. So once you are done showing your demo to your TA, you need to just write a sentence like 'We showed the demo' and need to submit in compass so that the TAs can put your grade there. Please remember, the sentence is not important. You can write even a single word. But the submission is important.
When will the TA contact us for the demo?

fc.fc_comment: Please contact your TA directly if you did not receive email yet.

instructorposts.description: We just posted the midterm scores in Compass2g. Here are the few important statistics about the exam: MEAN SCORE : 81.22, MEDIAN SCORE : 83.63, STANDARD DEVIATION : 8.21, OBTAINED LOW SCORE : 58, OBTAINED HIGH SCORE : 96

comments.mc: Where can we go to look at our individual test results? As in, what questions we got wrong.

fc.fc_comment: Since I'm your TA, you can come during my office hours once break ends or set up some other time. I'll be available over break by appointment only.
alright, I'll come by next week or something.

instructorposts.description: This is just to inform you all that your first peer evaluation (an evaluation of the workload managed by each member of the group) is due on 1st March at 3:30 pm. This is an individual assignment. That is why, please submit your evaluation individually through compass peer evaluation #1 submission link. If you have already submitted this as a group, please submit it again individually.

instructorposts.post_title: Deadline extended for written project proposal and peer evaluation
instructorposts.description: We have extended the deadline for written project proposal and peer evaluation. The new deadline is March 1, 2016 at 3:30 pm. We hope this extension will be useful for all the groups.

comments.mc: The syllabus has also been updated to reflect this change and the date for release of Homework 2. Consider downloading the newest version of the document.

students.name: Ron
students.topic: I have sexual feelinggs towards my rat!

posts.post_title: Joey: Sure I peed on her. And if I had to, I’d pee on any one of you!
